Centrifugal & Plug Fan: AMCA Certified for Sound & Air Performance.

Certifications
Manufacturing facility and products are Certified and Tested in accordance with European (German) and American standards such as DIN EN & AMCA international to meet user’s requirement.

ee (3) in China, One(1) in Singapore, One (1) in Thailand, One (1) in India.
